newsitem.title: USA: USDA's Glickman to view flood damage.
newsitem.headline: USDA's Glickman to view flood damage.

text.p: Agriculture Secretary Dan Glickman will accompany President Clinton on Tuesday to North Dakota, to view flood damage and to discuss federal disaster assistance, the Agriculture Department said late Monday.
About 90 percent of Grand Forks, N.D. was under water Monday from the cresting Red River.
Two weeks ago in the area, a spring blizzard dumped up to a foot of snow, which melted and sent floodwaters across thousands of acres of the northern Plains when temperatures warmed up.
